nodes.text: Alaphoe Gardens was a collection of unique architecture and plant life located on Lalos Island, of the planet Procopia. It was considered the most spectacular site on the planet. The site consisted of the gardens, riding stables, a concert hall, and the Glass Palace. The noble families of House Cadriaan often held parties and reunions at Alaphoe Gardens during Capital Season.

In the Campaign guide of the Lords of the Expanse boxset the gardens are described as analogous to the 18th century Versailles - with concerts, fireworks and lawn parties attended by finely dressed aristocrats.
